description: Skip the meat not the flavour with this slow-cooked vegetarian stew recipe. You'll love the hearty combo of gnocchi, tomatoes, chickpeas, pumpkin and kale.
name: Slow Cooker Vegetarian Gnocchi Stew Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Gently fold kale through tomato mixture (see Tip). Cover with lid and cook for a further 2 minutes or until wilted. Spoon mixture among bowls. Serve scattered with chilli and basil, and seasoned with pepper.
